animals.name: Cat
animals.description: The Cat is a small, typically furry, carnivorous mammal.

abilities.name: Pounce
abilities.description:
This ability allows the cat to pounce on an enemy, dealing damage and stunning them for a short time. If the target is a mouse or a bird, the cat deals extra damage. 
Stun duration - 1 turn
Pounce distance - 4 squares
Extra damage - 10

abilities.name: Scratch
abilities.description:
This ability allows the cat to scratch an enemy, dealing damage and leaving them with a bleeding effect that deals additional damage over time.
Bleed damage - 5
Effect duration - 4 turns

abilities.name: Cat's Eye
abilities.description:
This ability allows the cat to see through any illusions or invisibility effects on enemies, revealing their true position. All allies get this effect.
Effect duration - 5 turns

abilities.name: Nine Lives
abilities.description:
This ability allows the cat to cheat death and revive with some HP after taking fatal damage.
HP after revival - 10%

animals.name: Chick
animals.description: The chicken is a domesticated junglefowl species. But chick has not yet reached adulthood.

abilities.name: Persistance
abilities.description:
Due to its persistance, desire to grow and sharp beak, the chicken has the ability to inflict bleeding every third hit. Attacking another unit will reset the counter.
Effect duration - 2 turns
Bleed damage - 5

abilities.name: Flutter
abilities.description:
The chick flutters its wings, gaining a temporary extra steps and damage reduction for next turns. Damage reduction works on enemy abilities.
Effect duration - 2 turns
Damage reduction - 40%
Extra steps - 5

abilities.name: Egg Bomb
abilities.description:
The chick lays an egg. If it is destroyed, the destroyer get damage and stun. Allies can walk through this egg.
Stun duration - 1 turn
Ability damage - 10

abilities.name: Cluck
abilities.description:
The chick lets out a loud cluck, asking for protection, temporarily boosting the damage and restoring some AP of all allies within a certain range of squares.
Damage boost - 20%
Effect duration - 3 turns
AP restoration - 20

animals.name: Fox
animals.description: Foxes are small to medium-sized, omnivorous mammals.

abilities.name: Deep Bite
abilities.description:
This ability allows the fox to bite its opponent, penetrating deep under the skin, and deals damage, which is related to the health of the victim.
Ability damage - 30% of target current hitpoints

abilities.name: Sly
abilities.description: This ability gives the fox a natural cunning, allowing her to avoid damage from every third hit received. Don't work on enemy abilities

abilities.name: Sneak
abilities.description: The fox can sneak around the battlefield, becoming invisible to opponents for one turn and allowing it to move freely without being detected. Attacks reveal invisibility.

abilities.name: It's a trap
abilities.description:
The fox places invisble trap, which cannot be destroyed. Trap deals damage and disappears after something is placed on it.
Ability damage - 35

animals.name: Mouse
animals.description: A mouse is a small rodent.

abilities.name: Gnaw
abilities.description:
This ability allows the mouse to gnaw on its opponent, dealing low damage but inflicting a weakening status effect that lowers the opponent's attack power.
Effect duration - 2 turns
Ability damage - 13

abilities.name: Night life
abilities.description: Mouse appears to be nocturnal, allowing it to see invisible enemies. Allies do not get this effect.

abilities.name: Mouse hole
abilities.description: Mouse digs a hole in any part of the map and hits all enemies around this hole. Mouse can dig a hole only on empty square.

abilities.name: Cheese lure
abilities.description:
This ability allows the mouse to place a piece of cheese on the battlefield, luring in enemies and distracting them for one turn.
Lure radius - 5 squares

animals.name: Pig
animals.description: The pig is an omnivorous, domesticated, even-toed, hoofed mammal.

abilities.name: Thick Skin
abilities.description:
This ability gives the pig a natural armor, reducing the amount of damage taken from bleeding.
Bleed damage reduction 50%.

abilities.name: Charge
abilities.description:
The pig can rush at its opponent with a powerful charge, dealing high damage and potentially knocking him back. If there is an object behind the target, it will receive 50% ramming damage, but the target will not be knocked back.
Ram damage - 40
Knockback - 1 square

abilities.name: Mud Patch
abilities.description:
When the pig spawns a mud patch, it creates a temporary area of effect that slows down enemies and deals damage over time.
Damage every turn - 7
Effect duration - 3 turns
Enemy steps count is reduced by 30%

abilities.name: Snort
abilities.description:
The pig lets out a loud snort, stunning all enemies within a certain range for a short time. 
Stun duration - 1 turn
Stun area - 3 squares around pig

animals.name: Rabbit
animals.description: Rabbits, also known as bunnies or bunny rabbits, are small mammals.

abilities.name: Bunny Hop
abilities.description: The rabbit have an abilty of jump over any obstacle, while he is moving. He can jump over only one square.

abilities.name: Bite
abilities.description:
The rabbit bites the enemy in front of it, dealing damage and reducing their movement range for a short time.
Effect duration - 2 turns
Movement range - 3 squares

abilities.name: Burrow
abilities.description:
The rabbit digs underground, becoming invulnerable for one turn and healing a small amount of health.
Health heal - 70% of current health

abilities.name: Charm
abilities.description:
The rabbit uses its natural charm to temporarily pacify all enemies, preventing them from attacking for a short time. Global ability.
Pacific time - 2 turns
